u.a: when camera begins , ROY is at his appropriate spot at "table" which is car , and indicates to ADA who is also kneeling beside car where her place setting is , and ADA moves over to sit where ADA should . ROY giggles and plays eating so as to inform ADA exactly what they are playing , with eyes always on ADA .
ADA follows suit and starts eating , then goes over to oven . ROY jumps up and moves to oven in answer to this .
shows her where the coffee is , but ADA moves away toward sofa .

excitedly adds this as ROY sits back down at table .

ADA gets repetition , with a helpful pointing finger .
after discovering where the baby is , ADA drops the subject and looks into suitcase and mumbles to herself , with back to ROY .

ADA mumbles . it is not clear what ADA is referring to as she has her back to the camera .

ADA turns to ROY and gets up and reaches for baby on sofa , but picks up tool bolt instead .

ROY quickly moves over to pick up box that ADA had just had in her hand and accidently kneels into , oven , sending all pots and pans crashing and knocking over oven entirely and adorably apologizes .
ADA does not react to his apology , only to kneel down and pick up after him . ROY meanwhile is sitting beside sofa putting different objects into small box with back to ADA , quietly to self .

ADA comes over to see what ROY is doing and ROY says this in slightly louder voice now that ROY has an audience , but ADA turns away and ROY takes his toys over to ironing board and stares at poster on wall . ADA crawls along floor and then walks toword cradle .

uses it to fix steering wheel .

ADA comes over to see more closely what ROY is repairing , with direct gaze to ADA . ROY sticks screwdriver securely in steering wheel and turns wheel and giggles , obviously pleased with how ROY has made the screwdriver go around with steering wheel .
ADA looks away and then looks back and asks ROY why he rubbcd screwdriver so vigorously .
ROY abandons car and answers .
and moves to sofa and puts screwdriver down .
picks up pliers .
and fixes car with them . ADA watches intently and turns away once and turns back as ROY has moved off camera , and ADA turns wheel noise .

emphasis on "I" , trying also to be helpful . ADA sits down on floor and moves truck along , making car noises with back to ROY .

corrects her for calling him "daddy" , with direct gaze .

before he can repeat the whole question , putting necklace on head , ADA answers quietly .
